programme.title: Le clan des irréductibles
programme.desc:
(3) U.S. 1971. A family of fiercely-independent Oregon loggers struggle to keep the family business alive amidst changing times.
Réalisation : Paul Newman
Avec : Henry Fonda Michael Sarrazin Paul Newman

programme.title: #IGotThis
programme.desc: (S04EP03) In this episode of #IGotThis: Finding independence. Two teenagers, two tragic car crashes, two lives forever changed. Find out how each grows up to become an independent woman willing to go after anything her new world has to offer.

programme.title: Double Tap TV
programme.desc: (S05EP29) We introduce you to Dateability, an app created by two young entrepreneurs frustrated with trying to date as members of the disability community. Can tech come to the rescue?

programme.title: Mind Your Own Business
programme.desc: (S01EP05) A group of students start a business that combats compost odours. Can the mentors teach them how to build this fledgling business?

programme.title: Ness Murby - Transcending
programme.desc:
(S01EP05) In the wake of Lex's unexpected early retirement, Ness and Eva deliberate over the options of getting a new guide dog, involving a potentially dangerous trip to the U.S.
Année : 2023

programme.title: Fashion Dis
programme.desc:
(S01EP03) Chris is a charismatic entrepreneur who just launched his first business. Chris knows that if he wants to close the deal his pitch and presentation both need to be on point, and his current, sport-casual look just isn't cutting it.
Année : 2022

programme.title: Rendez-vous politique surprise
programme.desc:
Sara Singh, NDP MPP and Natalia Kusendova, Conservative MPP examine how to address the challenges of hospital capacity, bed shortages, and health program cuts in Ontario, in the pre- and post-COVID world.
Année : 2017

programme.title: Dish With Mary
programme.desc:
(S03EP04) In the episode of Dish with Mary, Mary visits Executive Chef Dan Bain at Lure Restaurant & Bar in Victoria, B.C. Chef Bain emphasizes the importance of using local ingredients and cooks an amazing West Coast menu.
Année : 2017

programme.desc:

Année : 2017

programme.title: Les quatre sens
programme.desc:

Année : 2017

programme.desc:
